channel.title: Hey i need help with client
channel.description:
ok i have a googlescape based client but ive added every thing custom items and now theres few question
question 1# ive seen alot of client with screenshot tab and music tab and much more so i wondring if any one can give me a tut or help me with that
question 2# how do i give d claws working special att and str bonus and same with d plate body how i give it str bonus and defence bonus and all that?
please ive comed so far and i dont wana stop now.. thanks
